Complete Project.name: image-labeling
Complete Project.description: This project demonstrates how to build a simple image labeling pipeline using AWS services. Images are uploaded to Amazon S3, analyzed with Amazon Rekognition, and processed through a Python script configured via the AWS CLI to automatically detect and display labels with confidence scores. It’s a hands-on way to learn cloud-based computer vision.
Complete Project.notes: Current - Stack created. Next - Fix the S3 notification

Complete Project.name: event-driven-etl-automation
Complete Project.description: Event-driven, serverless ETL pipeline on AWS that automates data ingestion, transformation, cataloging, analytics, and notifications using S3, Lambda, Step Functions, Glue, Athena, and SNS.
Complete Project.notes: Current - Repository Initialized. Next - Create the entire stack.

Complete Project.name: aws-snowflake-e2e-project
Complete Project.description: End-to-end Snowflake data engineering project: layered stage/raw/curated design, automated ingestion + DAG, dynamic tables, Snowpark Python, GitHub Actions, and in-Snowflake visualization (Streamlit).
Complete Project.notes: Need to progress further with the Udemy course resource.

Athena.name: aws-athena-iceberg-demo
Athena.description: A hands-on demo showcasing Apache Iceberg tables on Amazon S3 queried using Amazon Athena, with table creation, schema evolution, and partitioned analytics.
Athena.notes: Done - S3 bucket created. Next - Create Athena tables

Databricks.name: databricks-terraform-bootstrap
Databricks.description: Terraform-based bootstrap for provisioning a Databricks workspace, clusters, and notebooks using Infrastructure as Code (IaC). Designed for scalable, environment-aware Databricks platform foundations with future-ready support for Unity Catalog, jobs, and CI/CD automation.

Google Cloud Function.name: gcp-webhook-to-slack-function
Google Cloud Function.description: Provision a Google Cloud project and deploy a Python HTTP Cloud Function with Terraform + GitHub Actions. The function is invoked by a GitHub Webhook and posts event notifications to a Slack channel via Slack API.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-environment-setup
Snowflake Demo.description: Environment setup demo for Snowflake Data Engineering labs, including roles, warehouses, databases, schemas, and baseline utilities.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-semi-structured-json
Snowflake Demo.description: Demo project showcasing querying, flattening, and transforming semi-structured JSON data using Snowflake VARIANT, FLATTEN, and casting.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-iceberg-tables
Snowflake Demo.description: Hands-on demo for creating and querying Apache Iceberg tables in Snowflake, including metadata inspection and joins with standard tables.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-external-data-lake
Snowflake Demo.description: Demonstrates Snowflake data lake patterns using external stages, external tables, partitioning, views, and materialized views.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-snowpipe-ingestion
Snowflake Demo.description: End-to-end Snowpipe demo showing automated file ingestion from stages into Snowflake raw tables.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-json-loading
Snowflake Demo.description: Demo focused on loading semi-structured JSON files into Snowflake using stages, file formats, and COPY INTO.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-batch-ingestion
Snowflake Demo.description: Batch ingestion and ELT demo covering file loading, JSON parsing, schema detection, and merge-based transformations.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-scripting-procedures
Snowflake Demo.description: Snowflake Scripting demo showcasing stored procedures, loops, exception handling, and procedural ELT logic.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-udf-extensibility
Snowflake Demo.description: Demonstrates Snowflake extensibility features including SQL UDFs, Python UDFs, and stored procedures.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-data-exchange
Snowflake Demo.description: Demo exploring Snowflake Marketplace and Data Exchange, including querying and deriving insights from shared datasets.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-snowpark-notebooks
Snowflake Demo.description: Introduction to Snowpark using notebooks, showing data processing and transformations using Snowpark APIs.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-unstructured-data
Snowflake Demo.description: Demo for working with unstructured data using directory-enabled stages, scoped URLs, and document processing.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-llm-functions
Snowflake Demo.description: Hands-on demo using Snowflake Large Language Model functions for text analysis, enrichment, and modular query design.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-unstructured-pipelines
Snowflake Demo.description: Pipeline automation demo combining unstructured data processing with Snowflake tasks and transformations.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-dynamic-tables
Snowflake Demo.description: Comprehensive demo of Snowflake Dynamic Tables including chaining, joins, refresh behavior, and downstream views.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-lakehouse-pipeline
Snowflake Demo.description: End-to-end Snowflake Lakehouse pipeline demo covering bronze, silver, and gold layers with ingestion and transformation.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-query-optimization
Snowflake Demo.description: Demo highlighting Snowflake SQL best practices for high-performance queries, pruning, joins, and aggregations.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-performance-toolkit
Snowflake Demo.description: Performance analysis demo using Snowflake query history, tuning metrics, and workload behavior exploration.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-performance-scenarios
Snowflake Demo.description: Scenario-based performance troubleshooting demo covering investigation, optimization, and validation.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-clustering-mv
Snowflake Demo.description: Demo showcasing table clustering strategies and materialized views for query performance optimization.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-data-unload
Snowflake Demo.description: Demonstrates unloading structured Snowflake data into JSON files using internal stages.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-observability-alerts
Snowflake Demo.description: Management and observability demo using alerts, notifications, and monitoring patterns in Snowflake.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-alerting-framework
Snowflake Demo.description: Advanced metadata-driven alerting framework demo using tables, alerts, tasks, and stored procedures.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-data-metrics
Snowflake Demo.description: Demo for creating and using Data Metric Functions (DMFs) to measure data quality and monitor datasets.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-azure-iceberg-tables
Snowflake Demo.description: Terraform-based reference implementation for building Snowflake Data Engineering workloads on Azure using external Iceberg tables, Azure Blob Storage, and modular CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-dynamic-table-basic
Snowflake Demo.description: 🎯Dynamic Table Lab 1: Implement Basic Dynamic Table with Incremental Refresh

Snowflake Demo.name: snowflake-de-basic-snowpipe
Snowflake Demo.description: Terraform-first implementation of Snowflake Basic Snowpipe, demonstrating infrastructure provisioning via external modules and JSON-driven configuration. Focuses on basic pipes (manual refresh) with COPY INTO, stage, file format, table, and ingestion validation workflows.

Google Compute Engine.name: terraform-gcp-lab-01-gce
Google Compute Engine.description: This repository is part of a hands-on Terraform learning series for Google Cloud Platform (GCP).   Lab 01 focuses on provisioning and managing Google Compute Engine (GCE) virtual machines using Terraform, following infrastructure-as-code (IaC) best practices.

Storage.name: s3-storage-best-practice
Storage.description: S3 Security Best Practices using Terraform.
Storage.notes: Terraform test not added to CI pipeline

Snowflake Tutorials.name: snowflake-dynamic-table-tutorial
Snowflake Tutorials.description: Hands-on tutorial demonstrating Snowflake Dynamic Tables with incremental refresh, medallion architecture (RAW–CONFORMED–MODELED), and Terraform-driven infrastructure using modular, JSON-driven configuration.

Snowflake Tutorials.name: snowflake-dynamic-table-pipeline
Snowflake Tutorials.description: 🎯 End-to-end Snowflake Dynamic Table pipeline showcasing automated ingestion, transformation, and incremental refresh using dynamic tables, streams, and tasks. Built with a Terraform-first, JSON-driven modular architecture for scalable medallion (RAW → CONFORMED → MODELED) data engineering workflows.

Snowflake Tutorials.name: snowflake-iceberg-table-tutorial
Snowflake Tutorials.description: 🎯 Hands-on tutorial repository demonstrating how to create and manage Snowflake Iceberg Tables using modern data lakehouse patterns, including external storage integration, metadata management, and Terraform-driven infrastructure.

Snowflake Tutorials.name: snowflake-external-table-csv-tutorial
Snowflake Tutorials.description: 🎯 This repository provides a step-by-step guide to implementing Snowflake External Tables on CSV files, covering external stage setup, file formats, schema mapping, metadata refresh, and query optimization using a Terraform-first, modular, and lakehouse-aligned architecture for scalable data engineering.

Snowflake Tutorials.name: snowflake-external-table-json-tutorial
Snowflake Tutorials.description: 🎯 This tutorial demonstrates how to implement Snowflake External Tables on semi-structured JSON data, including stage setup, file formats, schema inference, partitioning options, and query optimization using a Terraform-first, modular, and lakehouse-aligned architecture for scalable data engineering workflows.
Snowflake Tutorials.notes: Ready to start working on this repo.

Snowflake Tutorials.name: snowflake-external-table-partition-tutorial
Snowflake Tutorials.description: 🎯 Hands-on tutorial repository demonstrating how to create and manage Snowflake Iceberg Tables using modern data lakehouse patterns, including external storage integration, metadata management, and Terraform-driven infrastructure.
